message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but $10,500 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down a little further to $11,000. This price still leaves room for both of us to gain something from the deal. Let me know if you're interested.

I appreciate your willingness to come down to $11,000, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'm thinking more along the lines of $10,750. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure it's a good deal for me.
